attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show my support for the president himself, but little did I know in one short hour I would get a whole trunk load of moldy oranges delivered to my doorstep. There was a note from the man himself telling me to get COVID-19 and go back to China (I am white). Also not to mention the oranges were disgusting and contracted a lot of flies which led me to getting some complaints from my neighbors which caused me to get evicted.

attributes.title: Worst Ever
attributes.review: Bro why don’t they have negative reviews bro elect Obama not this flat face, his face flatter than that chucky cheese pizza that be tasting like cardboard. It’s not hard to believe he’s a HORRIBLE president. Oh and now what he’s trying to delete TikTok... he crossed the line. I’m POSITIVE MORE THAN HALF of America is not on this “presidents” his side. So if you actually get this app enough bad reviews I think he can’t delete TikTok anymore cuz we don’t go down without a fight. #FightBack

attributes.title: GROSSSSSS 🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about trump but that app made my phone crash and took forever to download and then I realized oh wait!! Why do I want an app of a racist rapist, they show you the information you want to see not the bad or anything because I mean you know he wants to win but either way the app makes your phone be a mess don’t get it unless you want to waste your time

attributes.title: Stop trying to take down this app because trump hurts your feelings
attributes.review: You guys are limiting freedom of speech by taking down this app. Only because only fans lookin self Makiladancer told you to...

attributes.userName: the you dont know me queen
attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I tried downloading this app on Sunday and it JUST finish loading today. When I finally was able to open it, it kept glitching and made my phone spazz I had to takey phone to the Apple store and they had to bring out some machine to forcebly remove the app because it wouldn't delete. Even though this app is free it is still not worth it. Don't bother downloading it.

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app my phone shut down 📵📵📵. i hadn’t even opened the app yet and my phone had completely crashed❗️❗️❗️. next thing i knew i looked up and there was a rat colony running across my bedroom floor🐀🐀🐀. their leader introduced himself as ratatouille and demanded to use my kitchen 👨‍🍳 👨‍🍳 👨‍🍳 . i am petrified of rats so i showed him downstairs and he used all the noodles in my house to make a giant batch of mac n cheese 🍝 🍝🍝🧀🧀🧀. i am lactose intolerant so i couldn’t even have any😭😭😭. i have no choice but to remove the app from my phone❌❌❌. in hindsight i don’t even know why i would want to support a racist homophobic and sexist man who is scared of a bunch of teenagers🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️.

attributes.title: Would not suggest, does not work well
attributes.review: I heard of this app recently and I just KNEW I HAD to get it. I wanted to support Donald trump. But when i tried downloading it, it wouldn’t download for over 3 hours. Very disappointing. When I tried running the app it wouldn’t work. It kept CHRASHING and KICKING me out of the app. I could not get it to work. I am extremely disappointed with the app and would not suggest that ANYONE get it.

attributes.title: Okay but why
attributes.review: Okay, first of all this app took like, 20 something hours to download. Disgusting. Then, I tried opening it to see what all the biz was about and it crashed my phone! I tried three times, checked other apps on my phone, but this is the only one that did it. Absolutely unacceptable. I will not be supporting this app or any associated with it in the future, this is disgraceful 🤮🤮

attributes.title: Deleet before it’s 2 l8
attributes.review: The app took 3 whole days to download!! Why should i have to wait that long? That’s just ridiculous! I would rather be painting my orange self tanner on or building the wall in my backyard than sitting here to watch it download. Right as it downloaded, my cat started speaking in tongues!!! The first understandable thing he said was, “pat my head to join the Trump 2020 cult”! I YEETED my cat so fast and uninstalled the app. DO NOT RECOMMEND.. Supa scary.

attributes.title: WORST POSSIBLE APP
attributes.review: what kind of president would make his own app just to support his campaign. Like who does he think he is targeting for votes 14 and 15 year olds, oh wait they can’t vote. On top off that trump continues to only worry about himself and not at all about the US, not only is he racist but he is sexist and if you are gonna ignore the fact that he is an awful person just because he helped the economy then your sick!!!
